mapper.insert: insert into t_record(id, user_id, class_number, class_name, health_upload_id, schedule_upload_id, closed_upload_id, upload_date, health_image_url, schedule_image_url, closed_image_url) VALUES (null, #{userId}, #{classNumber}, #{className}, #{healthUploadId}, #{scheduleUploadId}, #{closedUploadId}, #{uploadDate}, #{healthImageUrl}, #{scheduleImageUrl}, #{closedImageUrl})
